alert.note: Alert for Pike; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:27PM CDT until March 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Pike County in west central Illinois... Southeastern Adams County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Northwestern Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frankford, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Barry around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Payson and Beverly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 near exit 2. Interstate 72 between exits 4 and 20. This also includes Siloam Springs State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for west central Illinois...and northeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for west central Illinois...and northeastern Missouri.
